name: Clicked
description:
Clicked is a collective of researchers specialising in insight on a global level. Researchers use a mix of consumer research and UX research methods to develop digital products, services, brands and communications. Assignment range from fast turnaround usability contracts to large scale international consumer research. We get digital. We know that the different dynamics at play online mean the digital experience is #1 in brand appeal.
Elements like reliability, orientation and empathy are all important in the user experience, and owned, earned and paid for communications are important on the digital journey to purchase. Businesses that use us like our skill set: Equal measures of qualitative insight, user experience knowledge and quantitative measurement. We offer research skills that reflect the life-cycle of digital products and communications: Strategic conceptualisation, audience analysis and exploration, research of communications and designs, user experience research and ROI of digital investment.
READ MORE...
